description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙帝的第二子，也是清代唯一一位在皇帝生前被公开册立的皇太子，后两度被废。死后被追封为和硕理密亲王。
description.en: The second son of the Kangxi Emperor of the Qing dynasty. He was the only crown prince to be openly established during an emperor's lifetime in the Qing dynasty, and was later deposed twice. He was posthumously created Prince Limi of the First Rank.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，清圣祖。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的第一任皇后，允礽的生母。
description.en: The first empress consort of the Kangxi Emperor and the birth mother of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，康熙帝第四子。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝皇长子，与允礽存在竞争关系。
description.en: The eldest son of the Kangxi Emperor, who had a competitive relationship with Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第三位皇帝，康熙帝之父。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty, father of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝外戚，一等公，孝诚仁皇后之父。
description.en: A maternal relative of the Qing imperial family, a Duke of the first rank, and the father of Empress Xiaochengren.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝嫡长子，孝诚仁皇后所生，允礽的同母兄。
description.en: The eldest legitimate son of the Kangxi Emperor, born to Empress Xiaochengren, and the full brother of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 允礽的第二子，曾被封为理郡王、理亲王。
description.en: The second son of Yunreng, who was created Prince of the Second Rank Li and later Prince of the First Rank Li.

description.zh-cn: 允礽的嫡福晋。
description.en: The primary consort of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 允礽的侧福晋。
description.en: A secondary consort of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝名儒，皇太子允礽的老师。
description.en: A renowned Confucian scholar of the Qing dynasty and a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝名儒，皇太子允礽的老师。
description.en: A renowned Confucian scholar of the Qing dynasty and a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝大臣及理学家，曾教授皇太子允礽理学。
description.en: A minister and Neo-Confucian scholar of the Qing dynasty who taught Neo-Confucianism to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝大臣及理学家，皇太子允礽的老师。
description.en: A minister and Neo-Confucian scholar of the Qing dynasty and a tutor to Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，曾任少詹事，负责教导皇太子允礽。
description.en: A Qing dynasty official who served as Junior Supervisor of the Household and was responsible for tutoring Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 允礽被废后遭幽禁并最终去世的地点。
description.en: The location where Yunreng was imprisoned after his deposition and eventually died.

description.zh-cn: 中国封建王朝的皇位继承人称号。
description.en: The title for the heir apparent to the throne in Chinese feudal dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 清朝皇室爵位的第一等。
description.en: The first rank of the Qing imperial nobility.

description.zh-cn: 允礽是康熙帝的第二子。
description.en: Yunreng was the second son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 允礽的生母是孝诚仁皇后。
description.en: Yunreng's birth mother was Empress Xiaochengren.

description.zh-cn: 瓜尔佳氏是允礽的嫡福晋（正室）。
description.en: Lady Guwalgiya was the primary consort of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 李佳氏是允礽的侧福晋。
description.en: Lady Ligiya was a secondary consort of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 允礽是雍正帝（胤禛）的异母兄。
description.en: Yunreng was the elder half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor (Yinzhen).

description.zh-cn: 允礽是允禔的异母弟。
description.en: Yunreng was the younger half-brother of Yinzhi.

description.zh-cn: 允礽是承祜的同母弟。
description.en: Yunreng was the younger full brother of Chenghu.

description.zh-cn: 弘晳是允礽的第二子。
description.en: Hongxi was the second son of Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 允礽出生于北京紫禁城。
description.en: Yunreng was born in the Forbidden City, Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 册封年仅一周岁的允礽为皇太子，并亲自教导，寄予厚望。
description.en: Appointed the one-year-old Yunreng as Crown Prince, personally tutored him, and had high expectations for him.

description.zh-cn: 允礽曾两度被立为皇太子。
description.en: Yunreng was twice appointed as Crown Prince.

description.zh-cn: 奉康熙帝之命担任允礽的老师。
description.en: Was appointed by the Kangxi Emperor to be a tutor to Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 奉康熙帝之命担任允礽的老师。
description.en: Was appointed by the Kangxi Emperor to be a tutor to Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 向允礽教授理学。
description.en: Taught Neo-Confucianism to Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 奉康熙帝之命担任允礽的老师（詹事）。
description.en: Was appointed by the Kangxi Emperor to be a tutor (Supervisor of the Household) to Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 奉康熙帝之命担任允礽的老师（少詹事）。
description.en: Was appointed by the Kangxi Emperor to be a tutor (Junior Supervisor of the Household) to Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 自14岁起，允礽与皇长子允禔开始了高压的竞争关系。
description.en: From the age of 14, Yunreng entered into a high-pressure, competitive relationship with the eldest prince, Yinzhi.

description.zh-cn: 因允礽在康熙帝亲征噶尔丹期间患病时“侍疾无忧色”，父子情份产生裂痕。
description.en: Because Yunreng showed 'no sign of worry while attending to the sick emperor' during Kangxi's campaign against Galdan, a rift formed in their father-son relationship.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝曾两度废黜允礽的皇太子之位，并最终将其幽禁。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor twice deposed Yunreng from his position as Crown Prince and eventually had him imprisoned.

description.zh-cn: 在允礽死后，雍正帝追封其为和硕理密亲王。
description.en: After Yunreng's death, the Yongzheng Emperor posthumously created him Prince Limi of the First Rank.

position.en: Prince Limi of the First Rank (posthumous)

description.zh-cn: 允礽死后被追封为和硕理密亲王。
description.en: Yunreng was posthumously created Prince Limi of the First Rank after his death.

description.zh-cn: 因避雍正帝（胤禛）的名讳，允礽的名字由“胤礽”被改为“允礽”。
description.en: To avoid the naming taboo of the Yongzheng Emperor (Yinzhen), Yunreng's name was changed from 'Yinreng' to 'Yunreng'.
